markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 2" pfs="Standard">[Water Breathing](/Spells.aspx?ID=370)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 384 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Spell Lists**
[Elemental](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=5)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>

<row>1 minute ([somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284))</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Target** up to 5 creatures
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 hour
</row>

</column>

---

The targets can breathe underwater.

---
**Heightened (3rd)** The duration increases to 8 hours.

**Heightened (4th)** The duration increases to until your next daily preparations.
name: Water Breathing
